author: youngwan-kim
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds a Phase2 MuTau HLT menu with proper P2L1 seeds.
Relevant JIRA ticket : [CMSHLT-3009](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3009)
Relevant presentations : 
 - [Tau HLT Upgrade 29th July](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1438104/contributions/6051492/attachments/2905048/5095863/240729_YoungwanKim.pdf)
 - [Tau HLT Upgrade 8th July](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1423309/contributions/6037339/attachments/2892346/5070401/240708_TauTrigger_YoungwanKim.pdf)

#### PR validation:
title: [TauHLT] Add Phase2 MuTau HLT
